Summary: UFO coming on the horizon ne at 1:35 am glowing red, blue,green,bright white then as it descends it get brighter then at above about 20 degrees to 30 it descends and dissaperas and reappears , only at a faint drorft star like it moves erratic .
divs: sighting detailsas of 08\2012 thru 12\18\2012 i started noticing a bright star like lights coming up in the horizon coming up in the north then subject matter moved to the north east now subject matter is showing up on the east this the main ufo pulsating bright red orange, bright white, ,then it would disappear showing up in different locations, before main subject matter shows up,these disco like stars show up up o 3 or 4 at a time casting bright red, blue,green,white glows this star like objects just like the main subject disappear for up to 1 to 4 minuets at a time then appear and follow a flight path. after i stated noticing main subject matter showing up later and later,first at 1:30 am back in 08\2012 now showing up at 4:30am on the east, i noticed a new star like glowing red, blue, green, white ascending and descending just like all the other star like lights but this new one is more active then all the rest of the small star like l have seen, this new star like object started showing up at 2:45 am 12\12 coming up in the horizon north east just by a water tower i use a marker now new subject matter shows up earlier 1:30am. tonight new subject matter disappear up to 8 times now is stationed and following a flight pattern but only up to a certain point then,before main ufo shows up at about 4:30 or 4:45 am the lights in the new star like light turn white, just like a faint star. i will be submitting my main report along with a up to 2 some what clear photos as to what i have been seeing, it is hard to get a photo of the small star like lithe for they are to far a distance, but in reference to main ufo i have some great picture i will be submitting. a mfon investigator should take a trip to my location and investigate main ufo along with the new starlike light that just stared showing up. at first the main ufo look like jupiter after i came to the conclusion it was not jupiter by using the star i'd on my ipad. now as time has gone by some of the old star like light still appear from time to time, now their is a new star like light that i know is not a star because stars do not desend and reappear at high speeds and move across the sky in less than 20 seconds. a lot of activity comes thru the town of horizion city tx. and as for the main ufo it still shows up every morning and would stay up till 8:00 am now main ufo stays up 6:30 am.
